Multiple users on Twitter shared the vid: indicating the widespread circulation of the claim.
The claim was shared on various occasion: including in 2019 and 2021, suggesting its longevity and persistence.
The video was also shared on Facebook: with a right-wing page posting it in 2018 and accumulating over 9,000 shares, further highlighting its reach on social media platforms.
The claim had been fact: checked by ABP News, a reputable news outlet, on two separate occasions in 2016 and 2018, indicating that it had been flagged and investigated in the past for its authenticity.
